__TOC__

If you start working on packages, please mark it with your launchpad id.
Status is one of:

* '''OK''': package checked, doesn't need any changes
* '''DONE''': package checked, changes applied and uploaded.
* '''<number>''': package checked, further details in bug report.

The Buildd column records if the package is built or failed.
